extDesc.message: Webpage automation tool for NYU websites.

mfaHelperNotSetup.message: Before you can enable MFA Helper, you need to set it up first.

mfaSetupPageNotSupportedDesc.message: The current page is not supported by MFA Helper setup guide. Perhaps you have clicked a different button by mistake, or there are some problems with your browser cache. To solve this, you can try to:

mfaSetupCanExit.message: Or, you can disable MFA Helper setup guide using the Exit Setup button.

mfaSetupLoginStepDesc.message: Enter your **NetID** and **Password**, then click **Login** button. *Note: this plugin only displays the overlay and has no access to your password.*

mfaSetupMfaStepDesc.message: Complete the **Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)** *(You might need your phone)*. After that, the guide will proceed automatically, please wait until it finishes.

mfaSetupSucceededDesc.message: MFA Helper has been setup successfully. You can close the page now.

mfaSetupFailedDesc.message: MFA Helper cannot be setup due to some errors. Please try again later.

enrollmentCancelConfirmDesc.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the timer?

enrollmentEmptyTime.message: Date and time cannot be empty.

enrollmentInvalidTime.message: Date and time must be later than now.

enrollmentPageNotSupported.message: Please click **Valid / Enroll / Edit** button, and select courses you want to enroll in.

enrollmentNoSelectedCourse.message: Please select at least one course.

enrollmentStartConfirmPrefix.message: Are you sure you want to enroll in the following courses:
